column4: There are two categories of perks you can train.  The first one will help you in battles.  The second will help you in infiltration.  You can change them before any mission.

column3: Do I recover after a battle?
column4: You will not recover your willpower after a battle, so fight wisely.  Your willpower will also go down when you fail in your infiltration tasks like lockpicking.

column3: Tell me about the infiltration perks.
